search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for PT Distinction (pt-distinction.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for PT Distinction can be found [here](https://www.ptdistinction.com/pricing) .

extracted_content.content:
Pricing - PT Distinction
===============
    

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655dd3911d348bdb1336f385/655dd3911d348bdb1336f3d4_Logo.svg)](https://www.ptdistinction.com/)

[Free trial](https://www.ptdistinction.com/free-trial)

[Home](https://www.ptdistinction.com/)[Features](https://www.ptdistinction.com/features)[Pricing](https://www.ptdistinction.com/pricing)[Our Story](https://www.ptdistinction.com/our-story)[Blog](https://www.ptdistinction.com/blog)

[Login](https://www.ptdistinction.com/login)[Start free trial](https://www.ptdistinction.com/free-trial)

[Free trial](https://www.ptdistinction.com/free-trial)

![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655dd3911d348bdb1336f385/655dd3911d348bdb1336f3ff_Hamburger-B.svg)

Plans to suit you
=================

No commitments or minimum terms - just simple monthly pricing. Cancel at any time in your first month and pay nothing.

Basic

$19

. 90

FAQs
====

**What happens at the end of my 1-Month free trial?**

![Image 135](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655dd3911d348bdb1336f385/65c9fbb06a4634fc531b9922_chevron-up.svg)

At the end of your free trial your membership continues and subscription begins (unless you cancel of course), a little like Netflix, Audible etc... You can cancel anytime in your free trial and never pay a penny.

**Do I have to give notice or pay a fee to cancel?**

![Image 136](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655dd3911d348bdb1336f385/65c9fbb06a4634fc531b9922_chevron-up.svg)

No, you can cancel at any time by clicking Account \> Account settings \> Subscription then Unsubscribe.

**Do you charge extra for additional feature's like other software?**

![Image 137](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655dd3911d348bdb1336f385/65c9fbb06a4634fc531b9922_chevron-up.svg)

No, unlike most other platforms we believe in access for all. That’s why all these incredible features come included in our packages—no hidden fees, no extra costs.

**How do I switch a plan?**

![Image 138](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655dd3911d348bdb1336f385/65c9fbb06a4634fc531b9922_chevron-up.svg)

You can switch plan anytime by clicking Account \> Account Settings \> Subscription and chose your plan.

**What if I have more than 50 clients?**

![Image 139](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655dd3911d348bdb1336f385/65c9fbb06a4634fc531b9922_chevron-up.svg)

You can add as many clients as you like. When using PT Distinction, managing this number of clients is easy and quick, even when giving them all personalized plans.  
  
Each client over 50 adds a small amount of $1.60 per month to your bill. This covers our costs in allowing unlimited programs, coaching and data for your clients. While some software offer unlimited client packages they limit the data per client and don't have the tools for you to coach large numbers. We're here to help you grow and offer pricing and the tools to match your ambition.

**Can I add extra trainers to my team?**

![Image 140](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655dd3911d348bdb1336f385/65c9fbb06a4634fc531b9922_chevron-up.svg)

Yes, you can add as many trainers as you wish to for free.
